Class TileMapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class TileMapGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to randomly generate tile maps.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TileMapGenerator

        public TileMapGenerator(TileGenerator tileGenerator,
                        java.util.function.BiFunction<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> function)
        Parameters:
        tileGenerator - the TileGenerator to use in randomly generating tile designs
        function - a function which maps x- and y-coordinates in index-space to keys in the FlyweightMatrix of tile designs in the Areas this generates. Note that the output of this function is automatically capped at 0 at the minimum. Level curves produced by this function will each contain a single tile type.
